proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure Apify Proxy to manage IP rotation, geolocation targeting, and avoid blocks during web scraping. To use Apify datacenter proxies, set `useApifyProxy` to true and leave `apifyProxyGroups` empty for automatic country selection, or specify a country with two-letter ISO country code (e.g., 'US' for the United States, 'GB' for Great Britain). For US residential proxies, set `useApifyProxy` to true, `apifyProxyGroups` to ['RESIDENTIAL'], and `countryCode` to 'US'.
